branchCategory.name: JMGP, Compact Guided Cylinder, Double Acting
branchCategory.description: <p>Series JMGP compact guided actuators are double acting, compact and lightweight. &nbsp;The JMGP is suitable for pushing, lifting or clamping applications.</p>
